sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 15-5-2 - Recompiled
sections.text:
History:Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 1; 1953 Comp., § 6-1-24; Laws 1965, ch. 225, § 1; 1977, ch. 247, § 61; 1978, ch. 124, § 11; 1980, ch. 151, § 17; 1983, ch. 301, § 57; 2007, ch. 288, § 3; 2007, ch. 290, § 20; recompiled as 9-27-20 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-5-1 NMSA 1978, relating to telecommunications duties, as 9-27-20 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 2; 1953 Comp., § 6-1-25; Laws 1965, ch. 225, § 2; 1977, ch. 247, § 62; 1978, ch. 124, § 12; 1980, ch. 151, § 18; 1983, ch. 301, § 58; 1978 Comp., § 15-5-2; recompiled and amended as 1978 Comp., § 9-27-21 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 7.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 7 recompiled 15-5-2 NMSA 1978, relating to staff and budget for central telephone services, as 9-27-21 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 6-1-26, enacted by Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 3; 1965, ch. 225, § 3; 1977, ch. 247, § 63; 1978, ch. 124, § 13; 1980, ch. 151, § 19; 1983, ch. 301, § 59; 2007, ch. 290, § 21; recompiled as 9-27-22 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-5-3 NMSA 1978, relating to charges for central telephone services, as 9-27-22 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 6-1-27, enacted by Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 4; 1965, ch. 225, § 4; 1977, ch. 247, § 64; 1978, ch. 124, § 14; 1980, ch. 151, § 20; 1983, ch. 301, § 60; 2007, ch. 290, § 22; recompiled as 9-27-23 NMSA 1978 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 10 recompiled 15-5-4 NMSA 1978, relating to deposits of money, as 9-27-23 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 6-1-28, enacted by Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 5; 1965, ch. 225, § 5; 1977, ch. 247, § 65; 1978, ch. 124, § 15; 1983, ch. 301, § 61; 1978 Comp., § 15-5-5, recompiled and amended as 1978 Comp., § 9-27-24 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 8.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 8 recompiled 15-5-5 NMSA 1978, relating to appropriations for central telephone services, as 9-27-24 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 6-1-29, enacted by Laws 1963, ch. 181, § 6; 1965, ch. 225, § 6; 1973, ch. 79, § 1; 1977, ch. 247, § 66; 1978, ch. 124, § 16; 1980, ch. 151, § 21; 1983, ch. 301, § 62; 1978 Comp., § 15-5-6, recompiled and amended as 1978 Comp., § 9-27-25 by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 9.

Recompilations.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 9 recompiled 15-5-6 NMSA 1978, relating to participation or exclusion of agency, department or institution in the central telephone system, as 9-27-25 NMSA 1978, effective June 19, 2009.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2007, ch. 288, § 1; repealed by Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 11.

Repeals.— Laws 2009, ch. 146, § 11 repealed 15-5-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2007, ch. 288, § 1, relating to telecommunications services, effective June 19, 2009. For provisions of former section,seethe 2008 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
